Title: Live: Greg Inglis to announce nrl retirement
description: South Sydney, Queensland, and Kangaroos champion Greg Inglis has announced his immediate retirement from rugby league.In an emotional, but at times funny, press conference at Redfern on Monday morning, Inglis said he came to the decision ‘a while ago’ and told his teammates following Saturday’s game on the Sunshine Coast.

Title: Opal Tower units still closed as work only approved now
description: The owners corporation behind the Opal Tower says it has many questions to be answered before it approves a plan by the builder for repairs on the damaged building — meaning residents could be homeless for months.

Title: Two fake cops robbed sydney currency exchange shop
